articles.description: A team of British women who won gold at the World Parachuting Championships with their stunning skydive routine have been dubbed the Fly-onesses.
articles.content:
A team of British women who won gold at the World Parachuting Championships with their stunning skydive routine have been dubbed the Fly-onesses.
